column2: The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

column1:
a: Projections based on medium-fertility variant.
b: Includes Christmas Island Cocos (Keeling) Islands and Norfolk Island.
c: Includes Nagorno-Karabakh.
d: Includes Northern Cyprus.
e: Includes Åland Islands.
f: Includes Abkhazia and South Ossetia.
g: Includes Sabah and Sarawak.
h: Includes Agalega Rodrigues and Saint Brandon.
i: Includes Transnistria.
j: Includes Svalbard and Jan Mayen Islands.
k: Includes East Jerusalem.
l: Includes Kosovo.
m: Includes Canary Islands Ceuta and Melilla.
n: Includes Zanzibar.
o: Includes Crimea.
